Package fr.umlv.square.service

Class DockerService

java.lang.Object
fr.umlv.square.service.DockerService
@ApplicationScoped
public class DockerService
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used as an interface between the application square and the Docker

    • runContainer

      public java.util.Optional<DeployResponse> runContainer​(java.lang.String appName, int appPort)
      Execute all the processus to run a container
      Parameters:
      appName - : name of application to be deploy in docker container
      port - : port of application redirected form docker container to current system
      defaultPort - : port of application to be deploy in docker container
      Returns:
      Optional DeployResponse: information of ran container

    • getRunnningList

      public java.util.Optional<java.util.List<RunningInstanceInfo>> getRunnningList()
      Return the list of RunningInstanceInfo which are contained in the docker by using the docker ps command
      Returns:
      a List of RunningInstanceInfo

    • stopApp

      public java.util.Optional<RunningInstanceInfo> stopApp​(int key)
      Return the RunningInstanceInfo of the application the user want to stop
      Parameters:
      key - : int which is the id of the instance the user want to stop
      Returns:
      : RunningInstanceInfo which the application the user want to stop
